name: Another Pipe Game
description:
Update of 04.08.2021 - 16h15

  • Added animations for the coins and the enemies
  • Reduction of the sound of coins

---
Another Pipe Game is a game (wow) where you have to avoid the enemies falling from the pipes while collecting a maximum of coins without falling from the platform. All this in a single minute !
---
Assets by Kenney
Music from a French TV Show (oui oui la France !)
Code by Minethan

Enjoy :D
